title: I liked Aatrox old wings because they looked like war banners
body:
Now they just look like wings. That's all I have to say atm.

Edit: I also hope they keep his personality somewhat similar. Rhaast is this crazy demon that kills everything but Aatrox from his voice-lines has seemed more like this wise-demon guy.

replies.body: I can't really agree here. I never got-into the banners as wings idea. I thought it was clever but they just looked awkward. Like broken wings or some kindof underdeveloped wings. Or wings somebody made who didn't really understand the actual structure of wings. fake wings.

I completely agree. Like yeah War Banner wings are a neat idea but...why are they wings? He couldn't fly with those old things if he tried. They look like he uses them to glide from high places at best or....look cool?

New Aatrox looks like some hellish brute who could drope out of the sky at any moment to create chaos. 

New Aatrox's design fixes all of my old issues with Aatrox, though I did kinda like his slimmer build better even if what he has now is more fitting for an ancient war demon.
I just hope they keep his champ select quote. It's one of my favorites.
Plz keep "Pain is temporary. Victory is forever."

> [{quoted}](name=AirKingNeo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6ORutOOy,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-06-11T19:41:32.879+0000)
>
> Plz keep "Pain is temporary. Victory is forever."

Plz. His lines are so cool.

no instead we get

"I AM AATROX, THE WORLD ENDER" because Aatrox mains really wanted to go from wise killer to crazy killer.
For real tho... they just ruined him imo

Agreed,the new wings are kind of a bummer as they look rather generic,wheras the previous ones were unique.

Though maybe they had to give him more functional wings to go with some of his new abilities.
{{item:3060}}  got removed as well, so they are at least consistent

#DeathToAllBanners!


EDIT: Apparently "#" does that. Pretend theres a hashtag there.

Hey guys we can finally finish that Aatrox rework
https://pre00.deviantart.net/6f48/th/pre/f/2018/124/6/5/smite_renders___chernobog_by_kaiology-dcao6sg.png
https://t00.deviantart.net/EPbQ_6ImhT6J5IcjIyIewPK9yaM=/300x200/filters:fixed_height(100,100):origin()/pre00/95be/th/pre/f/2018/124/6/6/xps___smite__chernobog__lord_of_darkness_by_kaiology-dcao6vl.png
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/DG-evYh4T0Y/mqdefault.jpg

Im trying to get a good photo with those lower back wings right under the sholder blades rather than on the sholder blades like they were before.

Oh as an aatrox main I was thinking 4 days ago but didnt want to really make a post. Aatrox Ult should get A pause during his passive revive (not ga or Zilean ult)  like Master yi's Ult does during meditate. Also Can his W get its ad ratio back (i dont care for the hp ratio becuase i want to build real bruiser not hp tank bruiser. Im not saying take away the hp scaling im saying give him back at least 70% of his previous ad healing) {{item:3812}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3091}} {{item:3047}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3124}} 
I dont see riot Taking away Riven's Ad ratio and giving her 5% of max hp sheild.
Overall, both wings are great though. I don't mind riot giving old aatrox's wings to a new champ/VGU in the future.
I get the banner wings idea but imo they never really suited him that well.. they looked kinda painful considering what normal wings look like, like they're broken or something.

> [{quoted}](name=Hiraeth Oblivion,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6ORutOOy,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2018-06-12T13:14:58.572+0000)
>
> I get the banner wings idea but imo they never really suited him that well.. they looked kinda painful considering what normal wings look like, like they're broken or something.

His wings always reminded me of Raziel from Legacy of Kain: Sour Reaver
I was fine with the wings being changed. But his curves!? They got rid of his curves!! Now he's just another buff character {{sticker:sg-janna}}

I just want him to finally use his fucking wings

Aatrox, Kayle, and fucking morgana all have useless wings

I mean morg is sorta fine to me because they're all tattered and shit

but bard literally floats and the people with wings have nothing to show for it

> [{quoted}](name=T3H UB3RN07,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6ORutOOy,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-06-11T21:58:28.847+0000)
>
> Aatrox, Kayle, and fucking morgana all have useless wings
> 
>Kayle

Wat

She flies like 24/7

kinda...

not really

there's no effect, her wings are about as important to her kit as singed's shield (Holy fuck say "Singed's" out loud)
That's when you make a mental note to say the e that is usually silent.

> [{quoted}](name=T3H UB3RN07,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6ORutOOy,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2018-06-11T22:02:58.664+0000)
>
> kinda...
> 
> not really
> 
> there's no effect, her wings are about as important to her kit as singed's shield (Holy fuck say "Singed's" out loud)

I mean... They serve the purpose of keeping her in the air... Does she need an ability in her kit that uses them to attack/defend? That would be like saying Heimerdinger needs an ability where he uses his afro to smother people XD (though that would be amusing)
That's why you must go all educated and say "Her wings posses the importance comparable to the shield carried by champion also known as Singed."
any one else get reminded of [oryx?](https://i.pinimg.com/originals/04/98/5a/04985ac5fb0db31e7eae9edd632babcc.gif)

Speaking of Rhaast, I still don't understand his personality shift after transforming.
When he's in the scythe, he is somewhat reminiscent of Aatrox, but more relaxed.  Violent, but joking.  Just plain sinister.  It actually caught me by surprise how normal a member of an ancient war race could act.

But then he transforms and goes from cold, joking murderer into "STAB STAB KILL KILL" mode.

Back to Aatrox - I hope that they stylize his wings so that they take a similar shape to their old version when folded, and only go into the bat wing spread out in some circumstances, like, if his ult is still a self buff.

That's poor story telling for you. I wish Rhaast kept that charm after he got released. Cunning, charming, seductive. But once free his level of intelligence sinks like a rock and suddenly blind, ignorant bloodlust.

> [{quoted}](name=Thuban Levinormr,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6ORutOOy,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2018-06-12T10:25:13.648+0000)
>
> That's poor story telling for you. I wish Rhaast kept that charm after he got released. Cunning, charming, seductive. But once free his level of intelligence sinks like a rock and suddenly blind, ignorant bloodlust.

Or good story telling? It's the work of someone trying to seduce some one else. No one else can hear Rhaast, just Kayn, and he's trying to make Kayn give in, release control so he can take over. Once the deed is done, he doesn't have to seduce any more, he won. Time for glorious killing.
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/mobile/000/025/936/apyrrr.jpg
"I really hope they learned from past mistakes on reworks and that you get the best of all possible changes." - A Maokai Main

What upsets me more than our demon edgeboy's banner wings being replaced is the fact that they made his lips the same color as the rest of his face.

Gonna miss that black lipstick... {{champion:266}}

So, the wings are fine, less like ornaments in my view that don't look like they'd work. I have a crazy lore theory however on who Aatrox host is based on the wings.

In the lore for Rhaast it was stated that the Darklin were defeated by the Golden Armour Warrior Queen... let's say this is Kayle. The 5 remaining Darkin to powerful to be defeated out right were trapped in their weapons then locked away, 3 aren't locked away anymore. We know how 2 'got out' but not Aatrox.

My lore theory is that Aatrox being the most powerful was left in a secret location far away being looked over by an immortal from the same race as Kayle and Morgana, keeping the idea that they are immortal angels. This ageless Angel stood guard of the sword for a long time but slowly was being influenced by Aatrox. He gave in and touched the sword and Aatrox near instantly took over, if he is meant to be that powerful his possession would also be easier. 

The reason he has wings is because his angel host had them, but the reason he doesn't fly is because Aatrox doesn't know how to use them properly. Look at Rhaast, he can take over Kayn but when he does his wall walking isn't upgraded.

... theory over.
They should give Aatrox 2 free banner of command actives as a treat to aatrox players the day before the rework comes out :P

I dont even know if hes going to be part of war anymore anyways. 

Going off of what we know of the other Darkin, they dont seem to be associated with anything but killing shit now, whereas in the current Aatrox lore hes apparently some harbinger of doom for the enemy or somethin
Rhaast isn't crazy lol. Jinx is crazy, Rhaast is not Jinx. Rhaast is too intelligent and cunning to be crazy.
His current wings are ugly. They are one of the main reasons that mecha aatrox looks so bad.
Let's be real, for an epic skin, Mecha Aatrox is super low quality. Only its chromas save it from being total garbage.
